last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ma Te must settle legal issues that Na Hong Ran frames him for. Bo Tong struggles with Ma Te's sudden change in behavior.

name: Bel Ami
overview: Dokgo Ma-te is the most beautiful man in the world. He is also an ambitious man and wants to make a lot money using his beautiful appearance. When he meets Hong Yoo-ra, the ex-daughter-in-law of a rich family, she recognises his ambitions and becomes his mentor. But when the poor, but adorable Kim Bo-tong surfaces with a huge crush on Ma-te, everything changes.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Bo Tong finds herself completely infatuated with her mother's friend's son, who only dates rich women from Gangnam.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The mysterious Hong Yu Ra gives Ma Te new goals in order to meet his father. Ma Te hires Bo Tong to help him out.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Bo Tong meets the male equivalent of herself. Ma Te receives a marriage proposal from Jackie.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Bo Tong and David begin to get a lot closer. Ma Te's new assignment is to learn how to control people's hearts with the help of the Electric Fairy.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Ma Te receives special lessons on reading people from the Electric Fairy. Bo Tong moves in with David.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Ma Te's next hurdle is to harness the power of networking through Kim In Joong. David and Bo Tong try to find a factory to support their sock business.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Ma Te gets caught in Kim In Joong's web when he requests a huge favor from her.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Ma Te must create a scandal with his fourth woman, Myo Mi-- world renowned star and the master of timing.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Ma Te finds himself getting increasingly jealous over Bo Tong and David's relationship.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Bo Tong is torn between her loyalty to David and her love for Ma Te. Ma Te is pursued by woman number five, Gwi Ji-- the woman with clout.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Ma Te finally gets to meet his father, but things don't go as planned. Bo Tong provokes and angers the spiteful Gwi Ji.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Bo Tong struggles over her newfound love triangle. Ma Te must woo the heart of his sixth target, Lee Kim-- a woman with power.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: The watch that belonged to Ma Te's mother and was given to Bo Tong proves to hold a huge secret about Ma Te's birth.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Ma Te struggles with his newfound birth secret. Meanwhile Yu Ra tries to recruit David to work for MG Group.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Ma Te finally realizes his feelings for Bo Tong, but when Na Hong Ran finds out she plans on using it against him.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Ma Te must settle legal issues that Na Hong Ran frames him for. Bo Tong struggles with Ma Te's sudden change in behavior.
